description: For the ultimate midweek dinner, try this garlicky chicken Kiev with cheesy sauce. Served with a crunchy salad, it's sure to become a family favourite.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Seafood free,Jun 2021,Low sugar,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Garlic chicken Kyiv with cheesy sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g Woolworths creamy garlic boneless chicken Kievs

recipeInstructions.text: Cook chicken in oven according to packet instructions. Meanwhile, melt butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add flour and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until bubbling. Gradually stir in milk and bring to the boil. Boil for 1 minute or until mixture has thickened. Gradually add cheddar, 1/4 cup at a time, stirring after each addition until smooth.
Thickly slice chicken and place on a platter. Scatter over chives. Serve with cheese sauce sprinkled with paprika, and salad, prepared according to packet instructions.
